article_title: OKC Police Officer, MMA Fighter Critical After Crash In Pott. Co - News9.com - Oklahoma City, OK - News, Weather, Video and Sports
article_text:
An Oklahoma City police officer and MMA fighter is in critical condition after a car crash Saturday night in Pottawatomie County.

Officer Matt Grice was off duty and sitting at a red light when another car slammed into the back of his vehicle near Shawnee. He was rushed to OU Medical Center, where he underwent brain surgery Sunday night.

Grice is a graduate of Harrah High School and was a highly recruited wrestler. He graduated from OU and is currently signed with the UFC featherweight division.

Visit Grice's UFC profile page.

Officer Matt Grice was off duty and sitting at a red light when another car slammed into the back of his vehicle near Shawnee.
He was rushed to OU Medical Center, where he underwent brain surgery Sunday night.
He graduated from OU and is currently signed with the UFC featherweight division.
Grice is a graduate of Harrah High School and was a highly recruited wrestler.
